summary.span: 声明权限，这些权限用于加载 XAML 读取器或编写器所使用的程序集中的类型。

span.span: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与方案相关，例如是否允许在部分信任下加载内部类型。 is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
